Package fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2023e3.utils

package fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2023e3.utils

Utilities for the Household Energy Management project.

This package defines utility classes for the Household Energy Management project.

  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2023e3
    Household Energy Management project.
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2023e3.mil
    MIL models and component simulation architectures for the whole HEM application.
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2023e3.sil
    SIL models and component simulation architectures for the whole HEM application.
  • Class
    Description
    CompoundMeasure
    The class CompoundMeasure implements a set of measures made on some phenomena, each having a value and a MeasurementUnit.
    ExecutionType
    The enumeration ExecutionType
    Measure<T extends Serializable>
    The class Measure implements a scalar measure made on some phenomenon having a value of generic type T and a MeasurementUnit.
    MeasureI
    The class MeasureI mainly marks classes from which instance of measures are represented; the two major subclasses currently proposed represent scalar and compound measures (made of scalar measures), hence the presence of the method isScalar().
    MeasurementUnit
    The enumeration MeasurementUnit defines in a simple way the measurement units used in the HEM application.
    SensorData<T extends MeasureI>
    The class SensorData implements a simple sensor data, with measures and time stamping information.
    TimedEntity
    The class TimedEntity defines the common fields and methods managing the timing information of timed entities.
    TimingI
    The interface TimingI defines operation which are used to retrieve timing information associated to some entity, like the time at which some data has been retrieved or computed.
